explains: adj. 躯体的；肉体的；体壁的

sentences.en: These are the autonomic and somatic nervous systems.
sentences.cn: 这些是自主神经系统和躯体神经系统。

sentences.en: The results showed that the mode of reproduction conforms somatic apospory.
sentences.cn: 结果表明，其生殖方式符合体细胞孢子。

sentences.en: Viscerosomatic reflex hypothesis describes that visceral afferent fibers cause reflex somatic problems.
sentences.cn: 内脏反射假说，内脏传入纤维引起反射性躯体问题。
